name: Dashboard for Clinicians - Product Design Interview Exercise
description:
Backstory

During the search of new opportunities, I’ve done few design exercises as a part of the interview process. After completing those designs, those files been left on Figma for nothing, so here I would like to share the files I created to tackle the design exercise, demonstrate my design work and thinking in a different fashion - So those are real life design challenges from some product-based companies.


Project

This healtcare company is a Europe-based startup who provides software solution for Doctors and their clients. Through the admin portal, doctors/clinicians can better keep track of their clients, optimise for efficiency and avoid mistakes.


(Company Icon and name have been hidden in the design.)


Task

We’re here to revamp the UI design of the existing portal, to provide a better user experience in order to achieve the mentioned goals.
